title: Clawson's Pub and Deli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves made-to-order sandwiches, draft and canned beers, sodas, near beer, and growler fills. Uses regionally sourced ingredients. Vegan choices include chick'n salad (mushroom based, no TVP or soy), grilled cheese with non-dairy casein-free cheese and house spice blend, a build-your-own sandwich option, chili (add vegan cheese and onions), cucumber and onion salad, and chips. All bread is vegan, with the exception of the gluten-free which contains egg whites.
